titleStmt.title: The loyall subiect's retiring-roome, opened in a sermon at St Maries, on the 13th day of Iuly, (being Act-Sunday) in the after-noone. A.D. 1645, before the Honourable members of both Houses of Parliament, assembled in Oxford. / By R, H. M, A. [sic].
titleStmt.author: Harwood, Richard, d. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
